channel.title: Webclient help!
channel.description: Ok, i have this thing that has cache and a few other things that i can use this batch file to "create client" and i created it after adding my own cache but i need to know, what kind of site do i add it to (e.g. smfforfree3, etc.) and how do i add the webclient to it? If anyone can help it will be really awesome! thank you everyone

item.title: Webclient help!
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

No, by you own i mean just a regular site that you own.
It can be a free website that you have FTP access to, or a web site you are running off of your server/computer machine.
It doesn’t have to be a .com site.

If you run your own web site off your server/computer, i recommend WAMP.
Which you can get here: http://www.wampserver.com/en/

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient help!
item.dc:creator: @aurocaido aurocaido
item.description:
@aurocaido wrote:

alright thanks, and by saying " YOU own" do you mean like a .com site? and do you think i can google results for that? (like how to make a .com or .org/.net site?) thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient help!
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

You can add it to any website that YOU own. You can not add it to forums. At least i don’t think you can.

This isn’t for server help, it needs to go to client help. But, you also might want to search around a bit. I think there is a web client tutorial. but i can’t say there is for sure.

Read full topic
